name: Sentinels of The Lost
description:
Sentinels of The Lost is an online only 2-player cooperative horde mode game for the PC designed from the ground up for friends who love to play together.

Players will choose between one of two sentinels, each with a vastly different set of skills, and work together to defend their crystal against waves of enemies hell-bent on destroying it.

Battling through the various types of enemies and encounters will reward players with loot that will empower their sentinels to aid in the defense of the crystal.  Finishing each phase of waves will culminate in a tough and mechanically driven boss fight to test your ability to work together as well as your mastery of your chosen sentinel.
